document_data.name: Aerilaya
document_data.mainbody: '''Aerilaya''' was a female [[green elf]] [[druid]] who came to live on [[Evermeet]] after wandering [[Faerûn]] for some time, spreading the faith of [[Rillifane Rallathil]].
document_data.Description: She was tall with long dark hair in a single braid bound with a copper headband engraved with oak leaves.
document_data.History: She came to Evermeet after an "unfortunate incident" involving an oak tree, great quantities of ale, and a [[Chauntea]]n [[monk]]. She eventually grew tired of life on the island, and around [[1367 DR]] she considered returning to Faerûn.
document_data.Relationships: She maintained a close relationship with [[Carreigh Macumail]].
document_data.Equipment: Aerilaya usually wore green druidic robes but in battle she would wear [[hide armor]]. She carried a ''[[staff of swarming insects]]'', a ''+1 [[scimitar]]'', a [[sling]], and an ''[[elfrune]]''.
